name: +Y
description:
This game was originally created in 48 Hours (Not part of an organised Jam) and is an early prototype and will change alot throughout development.

Climb to the top of each level whilst avoiding the rising deadly green. As of the last update there are 7 levels to play which are all timed. How fast can you go?

Level 1-5 are introductionary levels, levels 6/7 are harder and targetted for those more familier with similar games.

Controls

Teleport - Touchpad Press (Level Select Only)

Grab - Trigger

Use Buttons - Push them with the controller

Known Issues

  • Boxes can be grabbed through walls
  • Body can sometime 'stick' to walls

Leave any bugs/suggestions below

For HTC VIVE only, untested with other headsets (I'll add more on request).

Enjoy!
